about_the_game:
Mechanical Refrigerator (Reefer) package includes cars from the following railroads:

  • ARMN (Union Pacific Railroad Co.),
  • BNSF (Burlington Northern Santa Fe Railway Inc.),
  • CEFX (CIT Equipment Finance Corporation),
  • TILX (Trinity Industries Leasing),
  • SPFE (Pacific Fruit Express),
  • BNFE (Burlington Northern Railroad),
  • TPIX (Tropicana Products),
  • CRYX (Cryo-Trans),
  • and AMTK (Amtrak).

Each reefer has various products and textures, animation, running numbers, and sound.

Included Assets:

Reefer:

  • DIC-Reefer AMTK 1 (clean)
  • DIC-Reefer ARMN 2a (graffiti)
  • DIC-Reefer ARMN 2 (dirty)
  • DIC-Reefer ARMN 1 (clean)
  • DIC-Reefer ARMN 2 (clean)
  • DIC-Reefer ARMN 1 (dirty)
  • DIC-Reefer ARMN 2b (graffiti)
  • DIC-Reefer ARMN 1a (graffiti)
  • DIC-Reefer ARMN 2c (graffiti)
  • DIC-Reefer ARMN 2d (graffiti)
  • DIC-Reefer ARMN 3 (clean)
  • DIC-Reefer BNFE 1 (clean)
  • DIC-Reefer BNSF 1 (clean)
  • DIC-Reefer BNSF 1 (dirty)
  • DIC-Reefer BNSF 2 (clean)
  • DIC-Reefer BNSF 2 (dirty)
  • DIC-Reefer BNSF 2a (grafitti)
  • DIC-Reefer CEFX (clean)
  • DIC-Reefer CEFX (dirty)
  • DIC-Reefer CEFX (graffiti)
  • DIC-Reefer Chilled Express 1 (clean)
  • DIC-Reefer CRYO
  • DIC-Reefer CRYO - Protecting Today (graffiti)
  • DIC-Reefer Southern Pacific 1 (clean)
  • DIC-Reefer TILX (clean)
  • DIC-Reefer TILX (dirty)
  • DIC-Reefer Tropicana

Commodities:

  • DIC-Maple Leafs Food
  • Beer-Large Pallet of Falstaff Bottles
  • DIC-Frozen orange juice
  • Beer-Large Pallet of Falstaff Minikegs
  • DIC-Fish on ice
  • DIC-Fish fillet
  • DIC-Meat Cow
  • DIC-Hochland-BP Corned Beef
  • DIC-Hochland-SP Corned Beef
  • DIC-Meat Pig
  • DIC-Pilgrims
  • DIC-Sanderson Farms
  • DIC-Tyson Food
detailed_description:
Mechanical Refrigerator (Reefer) package includes cars from the following railroads:

  • ARMN (Union Pacific Railroad Co.),
  • BNSF (Burlington Northern Santa Fe Railway Inc.),
  • CEFX (CIT Equipment Finance Corporation),

  • SPFE (Pacific Fruit Express),
  • BNFE (Burlington Northern Railroad),
  • TPIX (Tropicana Products),

Each reefer has various products and textures, animation, running numbers, and sound.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.12
  • Processor: Intel i5 2Ghz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Pro 555 with 1GB VRAM supporting OpenGL 3.3
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes

name: TANE DLC - DIC-Reefer (Mechanical Refrigerator)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 3GHz 64Bit Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GT 430 or better/ AMD ATI 5550 or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes

short_description: Mechanical Refrigerator (Reefer) packs includes a wide variety of products and textures, animation, running numbers, and sound.
